mapper.select: SELECT a.mid,f.mname,a.tid,a.tname,a.school AS tmschool,a.departname AS tmdepartname,a.orgtype,a.region,b.tcode ,c.tmname,c.birthday,c.sex,c.phone,c.picurl ,c.tmid,c.email,c.ckstatus,c.did,c.didtype ,c.school,c.departname,c.folk,c.diningtype,c.roleflg,c.disclaimerurl ,d.invoicename,d.taxpayernumber,d.banknumber,d.addressphone,d.receiveaddress,d.paymenturl,b.serialnum,e.rname FROM tm_team a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.tmid,a.tid,a.serialnum,a.tcode FROM re_raceteammember a WHERE a.tid= #{0} and a.rid= #{1} ) b ON b.tid = a.tid LEFT join ma_match f on f.mid=a.mid LEFT JOIN tm_member c ON c.tmid = b.tmid LEFT JOIN os_user d ON d.uid=a.signuid LEFT JOIN ma_race e ON e.rid= #{1} WHERE a.tid=#{0} AND c.delflg='00' and a.tstatus='00' and c.tmstatus='00' and c.delflg='00' ORDER BY c.roleflg,b.serialnum
